text: @senatemajldr Maybe you can answer this question Senate Majority Leader.  Kevin McCarthy will not.  How do F-35s help provide relief for the coronavirus?  It's in the bill and we're curious.  It's like getting the final check at dinner and seeing a line item for power tools. 🤔
